name: SCORPIUX
description: Ahh, arcade games. Something about that classic era of video games. They were so simple, enjoyable and fun to play.  Well, even though we have moved on to better and more advanced games; Ain't nothing like a nice simple game to play every once in awhile and Scorpiux is exactly that.  In this short retro style game, player must destroy the  EcosystemX Stations that has caused abnormal growth to the environment. While the task sounds easy, it's not so simple. Avoid the deadly oversize scorpions that's out for the kill. Collect points destroying the enemies (OR by finding hi-point gems inside the rocks) earning your place on the Leader Board. Now, lets play some old-skool style retro games!
